articles.content: All residents of disability care homes with complex needs, regardless of age, will receive Pfizer vaccines as the nations rollout strategy pivots away from AstraZeneca as the main COVID-19 vaccinatio… [+1326 chars]

articles.description: The English outfit came from behind to beat PSG in the first leg of its Champions League semifinal as ghosts of failures past were extinguished.
